topics.body:
I just thought of the biggest argument *FOR* trying to find alien life: we've as a species have only been putting out radio waves for over a hundred years; more than likely if we do find a radio signal from a alien race they'll be *WAY* more advance than us so no matter what the radio wave contains it will jump our technological level by hundreds of years.

Hell it could be something as simple as a alien asking another alien for a nude photo and it would advance our technological level by a lot.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
